1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Its our very own Desi Style Marriage show. We will be inviting various couples of Indian Origin. Together we will go down the memory lane... bring back the days before they got married, fun filled stories about their marriage, heart touching stories about their life together and passionate dreams for the future! A fun filled, emotionally charged show with some candid questions and a peak into the the lives of our special guests. We will also be introducing an eligible bachelor/ bachelorette for match making!
imdb.title: Kasme Vaade: A Desi Marriage Show
akas: Kasme Vaade: A Desi Marriage Show (United States)
plot: This is a family TV show where we will share true and intimate stories of couples of Indian Origin from across the World.::Bloomfield Township

Its our very own Desi Style Marriage show. We will be inviting various couples of Indian Origin. Together we will go down the memory lane... bring back the days before they got married, fun filled stories about their marriage, heart touching stories about their life together and passionate dreams for the future! A fun filled, emotionally charged show with some candid questions and a peak into the the lives of our special guests.
